mapper.select: SELECT count(1) as value FROM SPS_SUPPLIER
SELECT count(1) as value FROM SPS_SUPPLIER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT count(1) as value FROM SPS_SUPPLIER

SELECT count(1) as value from ( select sp.sp_id,sp.sp_name,sp.contactor,sp.mobile,sp.sp_email from sp_service sp INNER JOIN sps_scheme scheme on scheme.sp_id=sp.sp_id INNER JOIN bs_area area on area.area_id = scheme.area_id where scheme.cp_id = #{cpId} and scheme.state='USE' and scheme.dr=0 and scheme.sp_id!=-999
and concat_ws(',',sp.sp_name,sp.mobile) like CONCAT('%',#{spName},'%')
and scheme.sp_id = #{spId}
and scheme.scheme_id in (${authority})
GROUP BY sp.sp_id,sp.sp_name,sp.contactor,sp.mobile,sp.sp_email
HAVING group_concat(area.`name`) like CONCAT('%',#{cityName},'%')
) t

select sp.sp_id,sp.sp_name, IFNULL(sp.contactor,"") contactor, IFNULL(sp.mobile,"") mobile, IFNULL(sp.sp_email,"") sp_email, group_concat(DISTINCT area.`name` Order BY scheme.create_dt SEPARATOR '、' ) city, IFNULL(group_concat(scheme.memo SEPARATOR ''),'') supplier_name, max(scheme.bill_date) as bill_date, max(scheme.end_date) as end_date, IFNULL(max(scheme.price),"") price, to_days(now()) - to_days(sp.create_dt) create_days, IFNULL(b.personNum,0) personNum from sp_service sp INNER JOIN sps_scheme scheme on scheme.sp_id=sp.sp_id INNER JOIN bs_area area on area.area_id = scheme.area_id LEFT JOIN (select a1.sp_id,count(1) as personNum from sps_scheme a1 LEFT JOIN sps_scheme_emp a2 on a1.scheme_id=a2.scheme_id LEFT JOIN cm_employee a3 on a3.emp_id=a2.emp_id where a1.cp_id=#{cpId} and a2.state='USE' and a2.dr=0 and a3.dr=0 and a1.sp_id!=-999 GROUP BY a1.sp_id ) b on sp.sp_id=b.sp_id where scheme.cp_id = #{cpId} and scheme.state='USE' and scheme.dr=0 and scheme.sp_id!=-999
and concat_ws(',',sp.sp_name,sp.mobile) like CONCAT('%',#{spName},'%')
and scheme.sp_id = #{spId}
and scheme.scheme_id in (${authority})
GROUP BY sp.sp_id,sp.sp_name,sp.contactor,sp.mobile,sp.sp_email
HAVING group_concat(area.`name`) like CONCAT('%',#{cityName},'%')
order by sp.create_dt desc
